Package comp3111.popnames

Class NameRecommendationService

java.lang.Object
comp3111.popnames.NameRecommendationService
public class NameRecommendationService
extends java.lang.Object
Class NameRecommendationService is the class for Task Four Application.

  • Constructor Details

    • NameRecommendationService

      public NameRecommendationService​(java.lang.String dadName, int dadBirthYear, java.lang.String momName, int momBirthYear, int targetYear, int algoPreference)
      Constructs a new NameRecommendationService.

  • Method Details

    • checkInput

      public java.lang.String checkInput()
      Returns a string of alert text. In general, the function checkInput returns a empty string if the inputs are valid, returns the corresponding alert text if the input(s) is(are) invalid.

      Six inputs are checked:

      • data members dadName and momName: whether it is not empty, and no symbol other than alphabet is entered.
      • data members dadBirthYear, momBirthYear and targetYear: whether it is within 1880 to 2019.
      • data member algoPreference: whether an algorithm is chosen.

      The function will be called by the function doNameRecommendationService in class Controller.

      Returns:
      a string of alert text.

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName​(java.lang.String gender)
      Returns a string of desired name. In general, the function getName returns the recommendation on name of input gender.

      There are two algorithms for both genders:

      • Algorithm 1 (male): returns the most popular male name in the year dadBirthYear.
      • Algorithm 1 (female): returns the most popular female name in the year momBirthYear.
      • Algorithm 2 (male): returns the N-th popular male name with K letters in the year targetYear, where N is the last digit of the year momBirthYear and K is the length of name dadName.
      • Algorithm 2 (female): returns the N-th popular female name with K letters in the year targetYear, where N is the last digit of the year dadBirthYear and K is the length of name momName.

      The function will be called by the function doNameRecommendationService in class Controller.

      Parameters:
      gender - the target gender of the summary.
      Returns:
      a string of name.
